name: Format\ConditionalAutoPlacement
description: The object for defining conditional properties for an automatically placed component, and when the conditional properties are in effect.

properties.name: conditions
properties.description: An instance or array of conditions that, when met, cause the conditional automatic placement properties to take effect.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: A Boolean that defines whether placement of advertisements is enabled.

properties.name: layout
properties.description: A value that defines the layout properties for the automatically inserted components.
